setName(java.lang.String).Description: Set the name for the new data type. For private data types the name must have a format packageName + "." + typeName, where packageName is the application package name and typeName is a unique identifier of the @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#data#DataType_E@ withing package.

addField(com.google.android.gms.fitness..Description: Adds the specified field to the new data type.

Throws: if name or data fields are not specified.
build().Description: Finishes building and returns the request.

addField(java.lang.String, int).Description: Adds a new field with the specified name and format to the new data type.
addField(java.lang.String, int).FullName: public DataTypeCreateRequest.Builder addField (String name, int format)

ClassDesc: Builder used to create new DataTypeInsertRequests.
